items.sentence: Tom might bleed to death if we don\'t get him to a hospital soon.
I didn\'t need to understand French to know that they were angry.
I didn\'t want to drink any wine, but Tom made me drink a little.
I didn\'t want to go to Boston last weekend, but I had no choice.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time cleaning the kitchen floor.
I don\'t have enough time to do everything that needs to be done.
I don\'t know when Tom got married, but I do know he got married.
Tom almost never forgets to send his mother a Mother\'s Day card.
I thought you said you knew Tom might have to do that by himself.
I was surprised when Tom said he was planning to go to Australia.
